= Git User's Survey 2009 =

<b>The Git User's Survey 2009 has begun.</b>

[[http://www.survs.com/survey?id=2PIMZGU0&channel=Q0EKJ3NF54|Git User's Survey 2009]] is up now! Please devote a few minutes of your time to fill this simple questionnaire, it will help a lot the Git community to understand your needs, what you like of Git, and of course what you don't like of it.

This survey would last
from <b>15 July</b> to <b>15 September 2009</b>.

Have fun!

* http://tinyurl.com/[[GitSurvey]]2009 (expands to the link below)
* http://www.survs.com/survey?id=2PIMZGU0&channel=Q0EKJ3NF54

There is also alternate version which <i>does not require cookies</i>, but it
doesn't allow to go back to response and edit it.  
Please use the version above if possible.

* http://www.survs.com/survey?id=2PIMZGU0&channel=1MH6FTZV5O
